lead_paragraph: Fresh off her fourth Wimbledon title, Venus Williams will face Nadia Petrova today in the singles opener of the Fed Cup semifinal between Russia and the United States at Stowe, Vt. Also today, Vania King of the United States plays Anna Chakvetadze. Tomorrow, Williams plays Chakvetadze and King will face Petrova in singles before King and Lisa Raymond play Petrova and Elena Vesnina in doubles.
